mapper.insert: insert into caiwubaobiao (dno,rnumber,cnumber,cqjine,yk,qmnumber,qmjine) select #{dno},#{0},#{sum(idnumber)},#{sum(odnumber)},#{10000},#{yk},#{qmjine} from drugs,outware,inware where drugs.dno=outware.dno and outware.dno=inware.dno;
mapper.select: select caiwubaobiao.*,drugs.dname,drugs.cqnumber,drugs.dunit,drugs.dprice from drugs,caiwubaobiao where drugs.dno = caiwubaobiao.dno;
